course_title: Studies in African American Literature 1900-Present: Afr.Amer.Genre Fic:SciFi,Crime
seats: Seats: Maximum Enrollment: 20 / Seats Avail: 20Waitlist Total: 0 of 6
class_notes: This course is a study of African American genre fiction (science fiction, crime fiction, fantasy) from the Harlem Renaissance to the present.
course_description: A topics course dealing with major traditions and issues in African American literature from 1900 to the present. Possible topics include passing, black women writers, Harlem Renaissance, etc.
